name: LD49 -Unstable OS
description:
After an asteroid crashed onto your ship, you are bedridden and have to manage your ship via a smart phone, thanks to the person who decided that IOT on spaceship was a good idea.

But ... who made this OS.. It is so ... unstable, just like the ship... just like me...

How am I suppose to get home like this ?

---
This is a game build for LD49.

Instructions:

There are 2 things to manage.

1. The power level of the ship.
2. The temperature of the engine.

You will need to burn material to supply energy to the ship. Red material will make it hotter, while Blue will cool the engine. Red provide instant energy at the start of combustion, while Blue will provide a spike at the end when it finishes. Green provide a more balanced energy level.

When you run out material to burn, you will need to mine it from your surrounding,

Home is 3 minutes away. Can you make it ?

  • Note1: The Reboot button in the game does not restart the game. It merely reboot the device.
  • Note2: This game is best played on phone.
